entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries and rain showers ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Snow level rising to 1300 metres this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
